title: Biden to Give Speech About Threats to Democracy Ahead of Midterms
description: President Biden will talk about democracy and the threats election deniers pose to the voting process, one of several recent speeches about extreme far-right ideology.
dc:creator: Katie Rogers
media:credit: Tom Brenner for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden will give a speech about democracy at a time of heightened alarm about the threat of violence to political figures and their families.
